text: Steven Ray Nagel (October 27, 1946 â€“ August 21, 2014), (Col, USAF), was an American astronaut, aeronautical and mechanical engineer, test pilot and a United States Air Force pilot. Nagel became a NASA astronaut in August 1979. Nagel retired from the Air Force February 28, 1995 and as an astronaut one month later. Nagel died on August 21, 2014 of cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== *NASA Biography Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Missouri Category:American astronauts Category:Engineers from Illinois Category:Military people from Illinois
title: Steven R. Nagel
